text: Petrovsky () is a rural locality (a khutor) in Alexandrovsky Selsoviet, Meleuzovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 14 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 38 km from Meleuz, 12 km from Alexandrovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Meleuzovsky District
title: Petrovsky, Republic of Bashkortostan
